rules_text:
When Sandstone Sentinels enters the battlefield, create a tapped colorless Desert land token with “{T}: Add {C}.”
{9}: Sandstone Sentinels has base power and toughness 9/9 until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]Standing at nearly twenty feet tall, the sentinels are more spectacle than threat, though quite the spectacle they are.[/i]
